sourcesContent:
module.exports = inverse

/**
 * Returns the inverse of the components of a vec4
 *
 * @param {vec4} out the receiving vector
 * @param {vec4} a vector to invert
 * @returns {vec4} out
 */
function inverse (out, a) {
  out[0] = 1.0 / a[0]
  out[1] = 1.0 / a[1]
  out[2] = 1.0 / a[2]
  out[3] = 1.0 / a[3]
  return out
}
